And <S%G5231>over<s%> it the <S%G5502>cherubim<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2683>shadowing<s%> the mercy <S%G2435>seat;<s%> of <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G2596>particularly.<s%> <S%G3313><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G5130>these<s%> things were <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2680>ordained,<s%> the <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G1524>went<s%> <S%G1275>always<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> <S%G2005>accomplishing<s%> the <S%G2999>service<s%> of God.

The <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1213>signifying,<s%> that the <S%G3598>way<s%> into the <S%G39>holiest<s%> of all was not <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest,<s%> while as the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> was <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2192>standing:<s%>

<S%G3748>Which<s%> was a <S%G3850>figure<s%> for the <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G3588>then<s%> <S%G1764>present,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> were offered <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices,<s%> that <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G5055>make<s%> him that <S%G3000>did<s%> the <S%G3000>service<s%> <S%G5048>perfect,<s%> as pertaining to the <S%G4893>conscience;<s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> by the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5131>goats<s%> and <S%G3448>calves,<s%> but by his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> in <S%G2178>once<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G39>holy<s%> place, having <S%G2147>obtained<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G3085>redemption<s%> for us.

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5022>bulls<s%> and of <S%G5131>goats,<s%> and the <S%G4700>ashes<s%> of an <S%G1151>heifer<s%> <S%G4472>sprinkling<s%> the <S%G2840>unclean,<s%> <S%G37>sanctifies<s%> to the <S%G2514>purifying<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh:<s%>

<S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4374>offered<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G299>without<s%> <S%G299>spot<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2511>purge<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> from <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> to <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%>

For <S%G3699>where<s%> a <S%G1242>testament<s%> is, there must also of <S%G318>necessity<s%> be the <S%G2288>death<s%> of the <S%G1303>testator.<s%>

For a <S%G1242>testament<s%> is of <S%G949>force<s%> after men are <S%G3498>dead:<s%> <S%G1893>otherwise<s%> it is of <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2480>strength<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G4219>all<s%> <S%G3753>while<s%> the <S%G1303>testator<s%> <S%G2198>lives.<s%>
<S%G3606>Whereupon<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> testament was <S%G1457>dedicated<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

For when <S%G3475>Moses<s%> had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1785>precept<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3551>law,<s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3448>calves<s%> and of <S%G5131>goats,<s%> with <S%G5204>water,<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet<s%> <S%G2053>wool,<s%> and <S%G5301>hyssop,<s%> and <S%G4473>sprinkled<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%>
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> is the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>testament<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1781>enjoined<s%> to you.
<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> he <S%G4473>sprinkled<s%> with <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of the <S%G3009>ministry.<s%>

And <S%G4975>almost<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things are by the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2511>purged<s%> with <S%G129>blood;<s%> and <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G130>shedding<s%> of <S%G130>blood<s%> is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G859>remission.<s%>

It was <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G318>necessary<s%> that the <S%G5262>patterns<s%> of things in the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> should be <S%G2511>purified<s%> with <S%G5125>these;<s%> but the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> things <S%G846>themselves<s%> with <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G5025>these.<s%>

For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is not <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G39>holy<s%> places <S%G5499>made<s%> with <S%G5499>hands,<s%> which are the <S%G499>figures<s%> of the <S%G228>true;<s%> but <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G846>itself,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> to <S%G1718>appear<s%> in the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for us:

<S%G3761>Nor<s%> yet that he should <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G4178>often,<s%> as the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1535>enters<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G39>holy<s%> place <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> with <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G245>others;<s%>

For then <S%G1163>must<s%> he <S%G4178>often<s%> have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world:<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> in the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%> has he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> to <S%G115>put<s%> <S%G115>away<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> by the <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G848>himself.<s%>
And as it is <S%G606>appointed<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> to <S%G599>die,<s%> but <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> the <S%G2920>judgment:<s%>
